briefTitle: Combination of Olmesartan and Hydrochlorothiazide in Essential Hypertension
officialTitle: Efficacy and Safety of Olmesartan Medoxomil/Hydrochlorothiazide Combination 20/25 mg Versus 40/25 mg in Moderately to Severely Hypertensive Patients Not Adequately Controlled by Olmesartan Medoxomil 40 mg Monotherapy
summary: The study will evaluate the blood pressure lowering effects of two different dosages of the combination of olmesartan and hydrochlorothiazide in patients with moderate or severe high blood pressure.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change in Mean Trough Sitting Diastolic Blood Pressure
